title: Scp 8642 12
content:
You decide to snoop through some papers haphazardly stacked on a nearby filing cabinet, hoping to find some clue about what this department does. The first paper on the stack is… an unfinished horror story? Strange. You look at the next one, and find that it’s another unfinished story. The third paper looks like a draft for containment procedures and a description of an anomaly you’re not familiar with, also unfinished. You glance through the whole stack, and all of the papers seem to be stories or database articles that haven’t been finished. You open one of the filing cabinet drawers and find the same types of documents there. Same with the next filing cabinet, and the next one. This makes absolutely no sense. Is this department in charge of drafting database articles? But then why all the stories too? What are they doing down here?

You suddenly realize that you’ve attracted the attention of the trio of men in the back of the room. They’re working much more slowly than before, and they’re all doing a pretty bad job of pretending to not look at you. Then your eyes are drawn to the mysterious double doors near them on the back wall. It’s really strange; they look exactly like the doors you walked in through, as if they’re the entrance to another department. Everything is just so strange here, and you need to investigate further. You…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/13 Walk up to the trio and ask them what this department does.]||= 12||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/17 Investigate what’s behind the mysterious double doors.]||
